articles.description: In the upcoming episode of Anupamaa, Vanraj, Toshu, Pakhia nd others will go against Anupamaa and will accuse her for ruining the wedding.
articles.content: Anupamaa is one of the most popular television shows that has managed to win millions of hearts across the globe. The makers are adding high-voltage drama in their upcoming episodes, leaving netizens… [+1788 chars]
